channel.title: [317] An annoying problem
channel.description:
Okay, I think this might just be one of those things that has been coded slightly incorrectly.
When I use commands like ::giveadmin, ::xteletome, ::xteleto and other commands that require a playername afterwards, I often get a message saying "Playername doesen't exist" even though the player is online and the name is spelt correctly. However, if I kick myself and try again it works. Any reason why I need to kick myself first?

item.title: [317] An annoying problem
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Ah thanks guys, I will check it out…

Can I post my actuall codes so that I can actually understand the typo rather than just copying your codes?

But thanks so much

My Demote code:

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“demote”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 0;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name
                    + " is not a staff member anymore.");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    }[/code]

The only difference I can spot is the fact that the first part of the command looks like this:

int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

IM guessing this is the part that is going wrong. I will substitute your one with mine and see what happens…any reason why my one wouldn’t work though?

I took your command and basically edited it into a demote command. I still got the same problem…I’m just going to try and tweak a bit and il tell you what happened.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] An annoying problem
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Depends on where you need to kick yourself. In your face or butt? Lol joke. It could be a typo, go look to your code.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] An annoying problem
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Probably because the commands have a typo in them, or just a corrupt way of saying the command.
By the look of your source, I’m guessing you have Dodian/Devolution, try this:

if(command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("aaron")) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 2; c.savegame(true); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now a Admin"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

And for xteleto try

[code]if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 3)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

				if (otherPIndex != -1) {
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

					teleportToX = p.absX;
					teleportToY = p.absY;
					heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
					updateRequired = true;
					appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					sendMessage("Teleto: You teleport to " + p.playerName);
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to..");
			}

		}[/code]

If you get errors, pm me or if it just doesn’t work

Read full topic
